comments.body: Hi @gaurav1086 If we have find the NULL point, will should we just return false? How about create a new tstring object?

@Leslie-Fang , thanks a lot for the review. I appreciate your pointer, however I am under the impression (have to double check) that the caller of this function (GetImageInfo) should/would check the return value (bool: true/false), before trying to access the output buffer. Thoughts ? This function returns false at other occasions, hence I thought of returning  a false here as well.
